name: Introduction to Latin American Art
description: This is a course introducing students to the fundamentals of Latin American Art.

name: Studies in Pre-Columbian Art
description: This course covers the fundamentals of Pre-Columbian Art.

name: Latin American Art of the 19th and 20th Centuries
description: This course covers the fundamentals of Latin American Art from the 19th and 20th centuries.

name: Latin American Art of the 21st Century
description: This course covers the fundamentals of Latin American Art from the 21st century.
prerequisites: Latin American Art of the 19th and 20th Centuries
